title: Financing Global Health
description: While working at the Institute for Health Metrics and Evaluation, I built this interactive visualization exploring the flows of money in global health. The project provides multiple data views, including an original implimentation of a D3.js interactive Sankey Diagram, stacked bar chart, and map.

title: DiVVy Bike Sharing
description: This project, which won Most Beautiful entry in the 2015 Divvy Data Challenge, visualizes millions of bike routes in Chicago.

title: Tobacco
description: I contributed both as a researcher and visualization developer to this project on smoking trends around the world from 1980 - 2012. See the publication in the Journal of the American Medical Association.

title: stmBrowser
description: I built an R package, stmBrowser, that allows R users to visualize the results of Structural Topic Models.  The package launches an interactive visualization in a web-browser built with D3.js

title: Instagram Collage
description: A tool to make a collage of instagram photos.  Functionality includes downloading photos, showing photos full screen, and playing a slideshow of photos.  And yes, I made it as a gift.

title: Millenium Development Goals
description: This project leverages a story structure to communicate a complex topic and layout to broad audiences. More specifically, it answers the question, are countries on track to meet the Millenium Development Goals?
